title: Recovery: The Second Manuscript of the Richards' Trust
description: In 1359 BC a distress call was sent…In AD 321 it was received and acted upon…In 1994 an astronomer detected an inbound asteroid from deep space…The heavenly object was a NEA—a near-Earth asteroid…Its trajectory would pass perilously close…Perhaps this had something to do with what the Apollo XII crew had recovered from the moon…
author: W.J. Cherf
